pkgmetadata.longdescription: # glview[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/toaarnio/glview.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/github/toaarnio/glview)Lightning-fast image viewer with synchronized split-screen zooming & panning + HDR & WCG support**Installing:**```pip install glview```**Usage:**```glview --help```**Building & installing from source:**```
